Example xinetd config file

  1. # default: off
  2. # description: fastagi is a remote AGI interface
  3. service fastagi
  4. {
  5.         socket_type  = stream
  6.         user         = root
  7.         group        = nobody
  8.         server       = /var/lib/asterisk/agi-bin/phpagi/phpagi-fastagi.php
  9.         wait         = no
  10.         protocol     = tcp
  11.         bind         = 127.0.0.1
  12.         disable      = no
  13. }
